summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's C-Tango Multivitamin Eye Cream is a rich and restorative eye cream featuring a brightening combination of eight peptides, five forms of vitamin C, and cucumber extract for firmer, stronger-looking skin around the eye area.
details: DetailsBenefitsRefreshes and restores a radiant appearanceBrightens the look of uneven toneVisibly improves stubborn signs of damageImproves the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesGentle enough for AM and PM useFormulated at a skin-friendly pH of 6.8Dermatologist TestedFormulated without the Suspicious 6 - the six ingredients Drunk Elephant believes are at the root of almost every skin issue (Essential oils, Silicones, Chemical sunscreens, SLS, Fragrances + dyes, and Drying alcohols)Key IngredientsPower 5C Vitamin Complex: 5 forms of vitamin C work together to brighten uneven tone & firm skin. When paired with peptides & antioxidants, like vitamin E & superoxide dismutase, Drunk Elephant's 5C complex offers unparalleled defense against damaging UV rays, pollution & other free radicals.8-Peptide Blend: Rebuilds, strengthens, and improves the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.Cucumber: Antioxidant-rich, nonsensitizing plant extract.Research ResultsIn a consumer-perception study with 31 people after 8 weeks:96% agreed skin felt hydrated84% agreed skin felt smoother and tone looked more even81% agreed their eye area felt firmerItem 2588441How To UseGently pat a pump of C-Tango around the eye area using your ring finger. May be mixed with Shaba Complex Eye Serum.Tip: Leave C-Tango in the fridge for a cooling, soothing treatment.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Ceteareth-6 Olivate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Linoleic Acid, Phospholipids, Ceramide NP, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Ceramide EOP, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Palmitoyl Dipeptide-5 Diaminobutyroyl Hydroxythreonine, Palmitoyl Dipeptide-5 Diaminohydroxybutyrate, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hesperidin Methyl Chalcone, Dipeptide-2, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Fragaria Ananassa (Strawberry) Seed Extract, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Morus Alba Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Spilanthes Acmella Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ubiquinone, Superoxide Dismutase, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Phytic Acid, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Thioctic Acid, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Chrysin, Mica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Phenoxyethanol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Titanium Dioxide, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Dextran Sulfate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Steareth-20, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Polysorbate 60, Potassium Sorbate, EthylhexylglycerinShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently pat a pump of C-Tango around the eye area using your ring finger. May be mixed with Shaba Complex Eye Serum.Tip: Leave C-Tango in the fridge for a cooling, soothing treatment.

reviews.headline: Very good product
reviews.comments: Love this eye cream, very smooth and hydrating. No irritation at all

reviews.headline: Pills if layered with other products
reviews.comments: This is my first eye cream purchase in a long time, so im testing what works for me and what doesnt. First thing I noticed was that the packaging is nice, the cream is thick, you need less than a pea size amount per eye. However, if you layer with other facial products, this products can pill if not absorbed all the way into skin.

reviews.headline: Not hydrating, itchy skin and enlarged pores
reviews.comments: I had irritation around my eyes with this and tried using on the rest of my face/body instead, thinking it'd be less sensitive. I do react to a lot but my skin usually loves vit C products, and Beste cleanser is one of my favs. I've used other DE products like protini and didn't like them enough to repurchase but didn't have a reaction. I haven't tried babyfacial and some stronger actives, exfoliants are rarely hits with me and usually misses. Vitamin C though, all my dark spots fade (for the period I'm using it), my skin glows, for every vit C product I've tried. This, my skin is so itchy and hot and dry and red and greasy, my pores huge. I can't believe how prickly and itchy.

reviews.headline: The pilling is awful
reviews.comments: Ive used many eye creams and gels; and this is one of the worst. No matter how little I apply it pills all around my eyes. Don't waste your money.

reviews.headline: Not worth the money! üòî
reviews.comments: I have bad under eye bags and sensitive skin and have been trying to find a good eye cream and was hopeful with drunk elephant but it made under my eyes burn. It is not good for sensitive skin! Not drunk elephants best. üò≠üòî

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: Does not moisturize my under-eye area.

reviews.headline: I'm in love
reviews.comments: this is my favorite drunk elephant skin care highly recommended it works so well

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments:
I had high hopes for this product.

The pump for the bottle is very convenient, application is easy, product doesn't have an overwhelming scent. Overall, it did not work for me. I felt that it made my wrinkles even more visible (and maybe added more), so it looks like i'm aging 100x quicker; I'm only 29. I used it for about 2+ months, but I stopped‚Ä¶

reviews.headline: Yassss queen BUY IT
reviews.comments: I love this!! It is so cute on the outside and it feels so good on my skin!! It made my skin so smooth!! Buy it pls

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this from my mom before Christmas and I love it so much it feels hydrating also and also got rid of my under bags

reviews.headline: No way! I would NOT RECOMMEND!
reviews.comments: Used 2 days and horrible irritation/reaction. Itching, burning, dry/peeling, and swelling.

reviews.headline: Would not purchase again.
reviews.comments: First, this product caused my under eyes to burn with repeated use. I tried experimenting with it and trying different moisturizers, but it kept burning my under eyes. Second, the product was all gone after  only 1 month ($2/day). Not worth it.

reviews.headline: burns!
reviews.comments: this product burns my eyelids and makes my skin so dry :( so sad wish i could love it

reviews.headline: Renewed
reviews.comments: Its everything I expected.

reviews.headline: 1000% approve
reviews.comments: Wowzers‚Ä¶. This is the only lotion/cream/treatment that has worked for me in the past 10 years & ive only had it on my eyes for 3 hours. My dark circles are now a baby pink which is good for my eyes, my lids and the fine skin under my eyes is actually noticeably tightened/lifted & moisturized! The lotion goes into the skin & doesn't just sit on top! The price doesn't bother me as I have spent a good amount of $ on eye products that are bogous and this product is definitely quality, worth the price to me! P.s.- i have sensitive eyes and this product didn't irrate my skin!! My results were literally same day, i put this on 3 hours ago & my eyes look completely different!! I cant wait to see if my results improve or at least stay consistent throughout use!

reviews.headline: Worst eye cream!
reviews.comments: I tried using this because this brand is popular but really this SUCKS!!!!!! I spent a ton and when i used it it gave me a rash and baby acne. Didnt notice a single difference this is way overated.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: Love the fresh feeling it gives and it did help a bit with my dark circles only down side is its verg little product for the price! Ouch ! Wish ot came with more i finished mine after about 2 months and i only dab it in the mornings during my skin care routine not sure if i will buy again its pricey and i can use a more affordable one

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it but‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: It doesnt burn or cause any rashed and I have very sensitive skin. I feel like it made me look more awake but after 2 hours or so my make up was running under my eye causing more dark circles

reviews.headline: I do not recommend
reviews.comments: This product sucked the moisture out around my eyes and then created huge dry patches that peeled.  I stopped using it and went back to my normal eye cream and my eyes are back to normal.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments:
I traded in my points for this - honesty so no results at all!  I broke out with more white heads     

Wish i could get my points back 

But love the packaging

faceoff_positive.comments: TW assault    A few months ago I was involved in a terrifying assault that left me with a swollen black eye. Every time I looked in the mirror I broke down and the constant reminder on my face upset me. I had a little sample of this product from one of the packs so I started using it 2 days after the attack after the swelling subsided. This product helped me look in the mirror again. I used it constantly and massaged it in. My black eye and bruising went away in 1 week. I know black eyes take 2 or more and with the deep red and purple, I didn't expect to see the fade and results so quickly. Thank you Drunk Elephant.
faceoff_positive.headline: Reduces redness

faceoff_negative.comments: I have finished the full sized version of the cream after about 3 months of applying it every night before bed. I bought this, as I have these ungodly dark circles under my eyes for someone in their early 20s. For that use, I am not‚Ä¶ impressed. Because these changes are so hard to see when you look in the mirror everyday, I ended up trying to consistently take weekly photos of my face to try and document any changes. After reviewing them, and how the product makes me ultimately feel, this is where I landed:     Did it make my eyes feel hydrated? Yes!     Did it brighten my eyes? Kind of; it did, but I expected a bit more after hashing out $65, and all the hype around it.     Did it help my dark circles? Again, kind of (emphasis on kind of), but was expecting more.     I also noticed that the product did in fact have a *minor* burn when you get a smidge too close to your eye. User error? Definitely, but something to note if you have sensitive eyes, which mine are most certainly not.     I ended up purchasing some Peter Thomas Roth eye patches to use in conjunction about halfway through the bottle, and felt like both these products combined did a really good job. I felt like they both complimented each other, and helped enhance this creams effects a lot more. However, once again, this cream on its own, I was not super impressed.     Overall, I think this product needs a bit more work with the potency; I wouldn't mind spending more, but if this is the baseline I'm not enamored to continue purchasing it. The product had a lot of hype; I think it would be good for someone looking to add just a bit of brighten to their eyes and some good moisture, however, my dark circle girlies will need to carry on elsewhere.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nothing Crazy
